name: table-layout
author: Lloyd Brookes <75pound@gmail.com>
description: Stylable text tables, handling ansi colour. Useful for console output.

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md -t jsdoc2md/README.hbs lib/*.js -p list --member-index-format list > README.md; echo
scripts.cover: istanbul cover test-runner -- test/*.js && cat coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf coverage; echo
